Headline: #72 North Temporary Reroute at North Avenue/Clark
ShortDescription: 72 North buses will terminate at North Avenue/Clark due to a beach terminal closure because of overcrowding.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#72 North Avenue buses will terminate at North Avenue/Clark due to a beach terminal closure because of overcrowding.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #22 Clark Temporary Reroute at Clark/Addison
ShortDescription: 22 Clark buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Clark, Racine, Belmont, & Clark, due to street blockage near Clark/Addison.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#22 Clark buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Clark, Racine, Belmont, then resume their normal route on Clark, due to street blockage near Clark/Addison.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #152 Addison Temporary Reroute at Clark/Addison
ShortDescription: 152 Addison buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Addison, Racine, Belmont, Halsted & Addison, due to street blockage near Clark/Addison.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#152 Addison buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Addison, Racine, Belmont, Halsted, then resume their normal route on Addison, due to street blockage near Clark/Addison.

Allow extra travel time.
